column2: the  PE  Circular  02/2021  is  not  a  statute  and  has  not  been  issued  under  any
statutory provision or authority; thus, any act or omission under the said Circular
would not attract the remedy of a writ of Certiorari.
Even in pursuant to the new Circular marked ‘P5’, the JEDB is empowered under

Clause  III 
therein 
to  send  the  Petitioner  on  retirement  upon 
the  Petitioner
completing 57 years of age, with 6 months notice.
